title: Afghanistan Core Inflation Rate
description: Core consumer prices in Afghanistan increased 9.46 percent in September of 2022 over the same month in the previous year. Core Inflation Rate in Afghanistan averaged 5.36 percent from 2005 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 16.26 percent in March of 2005 and a record low of -2.88 percent in July of 2015. This page provides - Afghanistan Core Inflation Rate- actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: National Statistics and Information Authority (NSIA)
